00011 // goniometric.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "light.h"
00014 #include "shape.h"
00015 #include "scene.h"
00016 #include "mipmap.h"
00017 // GonioPhotometricLight Declarations
00018 class GonioPhotometricLight : public Light {
00019 public:
00020         // GonioPhotometricLight Public Methods
00021         GonioPhotometricLight(const Transform &light2world, const Spectrum &, const
00022         string &texname);
00023         Spectrum Sample_L(const Point &p, Vector *wi, VisibilityTester *vis) const;
00024         ~GonioPhotometricLight() { delete mipmap; }
00025         bool IsDeltaLight() const { return true; }
00026         Spectrum Scale(const Vector &w) const {
00027                 Vector wp = Normalize(WorldToLight(w));
00028                 swap(wp.y, wp.z);
00029                 float theta = SphericalTheta(wp);
00030                 float phi   = SphericalPhi(wp);
00031                 float s = phi * INV_TWOPI, t = theta * INV_PI;
00032                 return mipmap ? mipmap->Lookup(s, t) : 1.f;
00033         }
00034         Spectrum Power(const Scene *) const {
00035                 return 4.f * M_PI * Intensity *
00036                         mipmap->Lookup(.5f, .5f, .5f);
00037         }
00038         Spectrum Sample_L(const Point &P, float u1, float u2, Vector *wo,
00039                 float *pdf, VisibilityTester *visibility) const;
00040         Spectrum Sample_L(const Scene *scene, float u1, float u2,
00041                         float u3, float u4, Ray *ray, float *pdf) const;
00042         float Pdf(const Point &, const Vector &) const;
00043 private:
00044         // GonioPhotometricLight Private Data
00045         Point lightPos;
00046         Spectrum Intensity;
00047         MIPMap<Spectrum> *mipmap;
00048 
00049 };
00050 // GonioPhotometricLight Method Definitions
00051 Spectrum GonioPhotometricLight::Sample_L(const Point &p, Vector *wi,
00052                 VisibilityTester *visibility) const {
00053         *wi = Normalize(lightPos - p);
00054         visibility->SetSegment(p, lightPos);
00055         return Intensity * Scale(-*wi) / DistanceSquared(lightPos, p);
00056 }
00057 GonioPhotometricLight::GonioPhotometricLight(
00058                 const Transform &light2world,
00059                 const Spectrum &intensity, const string &texname)
00060         : Light(light2world) {
00061         lightPos = LightToWorld(Point(0,0,0));
00062         Intensity = intensity;
00063         // Create _mipmap_ for _GonioPhotometricLight_
00064         int width, height;
00065         Spectrum *texels = ReadImage(texname, &width, &height);
00066         if (texels) {
00067                 mipmap = new MIPMap<Spectrum>(width, height, texels);
00068                 delete[] texels;
00069         }
00070         else mipmap = NULL;
00071 }
00072 Spectrum GonioPhotometricLight::Sample_L(const Point &P, float u1, float u2,
00073                 Vector *wo, float *pdf,
00074                 VisibilityTester *visibility) const {
00075         *wo = Normalize(lightPos - P);
00076         *pdf = 1.f;
00077         visibility->SetSegment(P, lightPos);
00078         return Intensity * Scale(-*wo) / DistanceSquared(lightPos, P);
00079 }
00080 Spectrum GonioPhotometricLight::Sample_L(const Scene *scene, float u1, float u2,
00081                 float u3, float u4, Ray *ray, float *pdf) const {
00082         ray->o = lightPos;
00083         ray->d = UniformSampleSphere(u1, u2);
00084         *pdf = UniformSpherePdf();
00085         return Intensity * Scale(ray->d);
00086 }
00087 float GonioPhotometricLight::Pdf(const Point &, const Vector &) const {
00088         return 0.;
00089 }
00090 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Light *CreateLight(const Transform &light2world,
00091                 const ParamSet &paramSet) {
00092         Spectrum I = paramSet.FindOneSpectrum("I", Spectrum(1.0));
00093         string texname = paramSet.FindOneString("mapname", "");
00094         return new GonioPhotometricLight(light2world, I, texname);
00095 }
